TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Prompt extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 可以呈现的内容（文本或音频文件）的相关信息。

span.span: Represents information about what can be rendered, either text or an audio file, by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象可以包含纯文本、使用标记语言设置格式的文本或音频文件。A object can contain plain text, text formatted with markup language, or audio files. 使用的每个新实例创建一个空对象。An empty object is created with each new instance of . 类提供用于向其包含的空对象添加内容 (包括文本、SSML 标记、书签和预先录制的音频文件) 的方法。 The class provides methods for adding content, including text, SSML markup, bookmarks, and prerecorded audio files (such as .wav files), to the empty object that it contains. 通常, 应用程序将使用 (而不是对象) 创建提示并向其填充内容。Typically, applications will use , rather than a object, to create prompts and populate them with content. 若要从对象的内容生成语音, 请使用方法。To generate speech from the contents of a object, use the method.

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 从 对象创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class from a object.

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例，并指定要朗读的文本。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies the text to be spoken and whether its format is plain text or markup language.

value.span: 如果提示播放完毕，则返回 ；否则返回 。
